data.text: New Keynesian economists responded to the new classical school by adopting rational expectations and focusing on developing micro-founded models that were immune to the Lucas critique. Like classical models, new classical models had assumed that prices would be able to adjust perfectly and monetary policy would only lead to price changes. New Keynesian models investigated sources of sticky prices and wages due to imperfect competition, which would not adjust, allowing monetary policy to impact quantities instead of prices. Stanley Fischer and John B. Taylor produced early work in this area by showing that monetary policy could be effective even in models with rational expectations when contracts locked in wages for workers. Other new Keynesian economists, including Olivier Blanchard, Janet Yellen, Julio Rotemberg, Greg Mankiw, David Romer, and Michael Woodford, expanded on this work and demonstrated other cases where various market imperfections caused inflexible prices and wages leading in turn to monetary and fiscal policy having real effects. Other researchers focused on imperferctions in labor markets, developing models of efficiency wages or search and matching (SAM) models, or imperfections in credit markets like Ben Bernanke.
data.translation: 新凯恩斯经济学家对新古典主义学派做出回应，他们采用了理性预期，并专注于开发具有微观基础的模型，这些模型能够免受卢卡斯批评的影响。与古典模型一样，新古典模型假设价格能够完美调整，货币政策只会导致价格变动。新凯恩斯模型研究了价格和工资之所以粘性的原因，这是由于不完全竞争，导致其无法调整，从而使得货币政策能够影响数量而非价格。斯坦利·费舍尔和约翰·B·泰勒在这一领域的早期工作表明，即使在有理性预期的模型中，只要合同锁定了工人的工资，货币政策也能够发挥作用。包括奥利维尔·布兰查德、珍妮特·耶伦、胡利奥·罗滕伯格、格雷格·曼昆、大卫·罗默和迈克尔·伍德福德在内的其他新凯恩斯经济学家扩展了这项工作，并展示了其他情况，各种市场失灵导致价格和工资不灵活，进而使得货币政策和财政政策产生实际效果。其他研究人员关注劳动市场的不完善，开发效率工资模型或搜索与匹配（SAM）模型，或像本·伯南克那样关注信贷市场的不完善。

Taylor produced early work in this area by showing that monetary policy could be effective even in models with rational expectations when contracts locked in wages for workers. Other new Keynesian economists, including Olivier Blanchard, Janet Yellen, Julio Rotemberg, Greg Mankiw, David Romer, and Michael Woodford, expanded on this work and demonstrated other cases where various market imperfections caused inflexible prices and wages leading in turn to monetary and fiscal policy having real effects. data.translation: 新克朗代克经济学家对新古典学派的回应是采用理性预期理论，并专注于开发不受卢卡斯批评影响的微观基础模型。这类模型与古典模型一样，假定价格可以完美弹性调整，而它们的货币政策只能影响价格而不能影响量。新克朗代克经济学家斯坦利·费舍尔和约翰·B·泰勒的研究为这一观点提供了早期证据，他们证明了在理性预期模型中，货币政策仍然有效，因为在这类模型中劳动力市场的合同约束了工资，导致工资无法随市场变化而波动，从而使货币和财政政策具有实际效果。其他新克朗代克经济学家，包括奥利维尔·布兰查德、贾内特·伊恩、朱利奥·罗曼贝格、格雷厄姆·曼凯维茨、大卫·罗默和米歇尔·沃德福特，进一步研究了劳动力市场、信用市场和其他市场的不同缺陷，并证明了这些缺陷可能导致价格和货币政策的实际影响。其他经济学家则关注了劳动力市场的差异，开发了效率工资模型（SEW）和搜索和配对模型（SAM）。

value.text: 在这一领域取得了早期成果

data.text: CNN reporting on the ground has largely described students inside the encampments engaging in activities like poetry readings, painting and completing school assignments. There have also been examples of multi-faith prayers and group dancing. Yet hundreds of protesters have been arrested for trespassing and for violating school rules, including blocking access to campus buildings or other disruptions on campus. value.text: 进行了对十套各具特色的跑步耳机的测试

data.text: We tested 10 sets of highly recommended running headphones over the course of several hundred miles and two months. First, we polled the running community to see what headphones were most popular, then we combed through reviews to round out our list and checked with audio companies to make sure we had the latest releases. While running, we assessed not the sound quality but how secure the headphones felt while in motion, how safe we felt in our surroundings while wearing them, how comfortable they were as the hours went by and more. Our testing pool consisted of a mix of over-the-ear headphones, earbuds and open-ear headphones. Here is a comprehensive list of our testing categories.
data.translation: 我们在几百英里的跑步路线上进行了对十套各具特色的跑步耳机的测试，测试时间长达两个月。首先，我们对跑步爱好者进行了调查，然后我们根据评论整理了名单，并与音频制造商取得了联系，确保我们拥有最新的产品。在跑步时，我们的重点不是听力质量，而是耳机的稳定性和安全性，跑步时的安全感以及在长时间跑步后的舒适度等。我们的测试对象包括了头戴式耳机、耳塞式耳机和开放式耳机。我们测试了以下十个不同的测试项目。

data.translation: 我们在几百英里和两个月的时间里测试了10套备受推荐的跑步耳机。首先，我们对跑步社区进行了调查，了解哪些耳机最受欢迎，然后我们翻阅了评论以补充我们的列表，并与音频公司核实以确保我们拥有最新的产品。在跑步时，我们评估的不仅是声音质量，还有耳机在运动中的稳固性，佩戴它们时对周围环境的安全感受，随着时间的推移它们的舒适度等等。我们的测试库包含了头戴式耳机、耳塞以及开放式耳机的混合体。以下是我们测试类别的综合列表。

Our testing pool consisted of a mix of over-the-ear headphones, earbuds and open-ear headphones. Here is a comprehensive list of our testing categories.

data.translation: 梅恩瓦林上尉，可能是英国电视史上最伟大的第一个情景喜剧角色。他是1970年代非常成功的电视情景喜剧《老爸老兵》的主角，该剧讲述了一群英国老年不合群者在第二次世界大战中，形成英国的最后防线。梅恩瓦林是一个自我膨胀的小人物，对抗德国人和英国阶级制度。他经常不小心被他的中士，一个上层阶级但对此相当随意的人，以及他的士兵们所胜过，这些士兵从未真正给予他应有的尊重。这一角色由阿瑟·洛伟演得淋漓尽致，这部剧集至今仍然是英国电视史上最佳作品之一。

data.translation: 主演莫雷维尔（Mainwaring），可能是英国电视剧中最伟大的、最经典的角色之一。他是英国剧情喜剧电视连续剧《父亲兵团》（Dads Army）的主角，这部剧集是1970年代最成功的电视剧之一，讲述一群年过六旬的英国老人组成了最后一道防线，在二战时期保卫英国的故事。莫雷维尔是一个身材矮小的军官，却凭借自己的荣誉感和气概胡须噼啪作响地对抗着德国人，也与英国的社会阶层做斗争。他的上尉，柯林斯，是一个有钱人，却毫无架子，尊重他的下属。而他的士兵们也没有对他抱有敬重之心，他们只是尊重他的职位而已。这个角色由亚瑟·洛扎（Arthur Lowe）演绎得淋漓尽致，这部电视剧也是英国电视史上最伟大的作品之一。

data.text: A SpaceX Falcon 9 rocket with the company's Dragon spacecraft on top is seen at sunset on the launch pad at Launch Complex 39A as preparations continue for the Crew-7 mission, Wednesday, Aug. 23, 2023, at NASA's Kennedy Space Center in Florida. NASA's SpaceX Crew-7 mission is the seventh crew rotation mission of the SpaceX Crew Dragon spacecraft and Falcon 9 rocket to the International Space Station as part of the agency's Commercial Crew Program. NASA astronaut Jasmin Moghbeli, ESA (European Space Agency) astronaut Andreas Mogensen, Japan Aerospace Exploration Agency (JAXA) astronaut Satoshi Furukawa, and Roscosmos cosmonaut Konstantin Borisov are scheduled to launch at 3:50 a.m. EDT on Friday, August 25, from Launch Complex 39A at the Kennedy Space Center.
data.translation: SpaceX 的猎鹰9号火箭搭载着公司的龙飞船，位于发射复合体39A的发射台上，在日落时分进行准备。这是为了即将在2023年8月23日，星期三，在佛罗里达的NASA肯尼迪航天中心进行的Crew-7任务。NASA 的 SpaceX Crew-7任务是SpaceX Crew Dragon飞船和猎鹰9号火箭前往国际空间站的第七次载人轮换任务，作为该机构商业载人计划的一部分。NASA宇航员Jasmin Moghbeli，欧洲航天局（ESA）宇航员Andreas Mogensen，日本宇宙航空研究开发机构（JAXA）宇航员古川聪，以及俄罗斯航天局宇航员Konstantin Borisov计划于8月25日星期五凌晨3:50从肯尼迪航天中心的发射复合体39A发射升空。

value.text: 受生物大脑机制启发的深度学习技术在心理或认知科学研究的应用方面取得了重大进展，特别是在面部数据的记忆和识别方面。

data.text: The complex information processing system of humans generates a lot of objective and subjective evaluations, making the exploration of human cognitive products of great cutting-edge theoretical value. In recent years, deep learning technologies, which are inspired by biological brain mechanisms, have made significant strides in the application of psychological or cognitive scientific research, particularly in the memorization and recognition of facial data. This paper investigates through experimental research how neural networks process and store facial expression data and associate these data with a range of psychological attributes produced by humans. Researchers utilized deep learning model VGG16, demonstrating that neural networks can learn and reproduce key features of facial data, thereby storing image memories. Moreover, the experimental results reveal the potential of deep learning models in understanding human emotions and cognitive processes and establish a manifold visualization interpretation of cognitive products or psychological attributes from a non-Euclidean space perspective, offering new insights into enhancing the explainability of AI. This study not only advances the application of AI technology in the field of psychology but also provides a new psychological theoretical understanding the information processing of the AI. The code is available in here: https://github.com/NKUShaw/Psychoinformatics.
data.translation: 人类复杂的信息处理系统产生了大量客观和主观评价，这使得探索人类认知产物在理论上具有重要的前沿价值。近年来，受生物大脑机制启发的深度学习技术在心理或认知科学研究的应用方面取得了重大进展，特别是在面部数据的记忆和识别方面。本文通过实验研究探讨了神经网络如何处理和存储面部表情数据，并将这些数据与人类产生的各种心理属性进行关联。研究人员使用了深度学习模型VGG16，证明了神经网络可以学习和复制面部数据的关键特征，从而存储图像记忆。此外，实验结果揭示了深度学习模型在理解人类情绪和认知过程方面的潜力，并从非欧几里得空间的角度建立了认知产物或心理属性的多重可视化解释，为增强AI的可解释性提供了新的见解。这项研究不仅推动了AI技术在心理学领域的应用，还为新的心理学理论理解提供了关于AI信息处理的视角。代码请查阅：https://github.com/NKUShaw/Psychoinformatics。

data.text: My in-laws said bring nothing. But after the first time there I found a big void. They had milk water and wine. So the next time there I brought sweet tea. Now many years later if I don’t bring the tea it would be missed. Three gallons barely last the night. I also started bringing deserts. Monkey bread. Fried bread. apply dumplings. And Nutella filled ableskivers. . None of it has ever gone to waste. Although a couple dishes weren’t shared. And now instead of the dinner being an all provided meal. Others now bring specialties. While they enjoyed everything they are now much less burdened.
data.translation: 我的姻亲初时告诉我无需带任何东西，但我第一次去后觉得似乎缺少了些什么。那里有牛奶、水和酒。因此，下一次我便带上了甜茶。多年以后，如果我不带甜茶，大家都会感到遗憾。三加仑的甜茶一晚上就能喝光。我还开始带上甜品，比如猴面包、油炸面包、苹果饺子以及填了Nutella的丹麦球。这些美食从未被浪费过。尽管有几样菜没有分享出来。如今，晚宴不再仅仅由东道主准备，其他人也开始带来拿手好菜。虽然他们一直很享受这些食物，但现在他们的负担明显减轻了。

data.text: George spent most of his later reign in seclusion at Windsor Castle, but he continued to intervene in politics. At first it was believed that he would support Catholic emancipation, as he had proposed a Catholic Emancipation Bill for Ireland in 1797, but his anti-Catholic views became clear in 1813 when he privately canvassed against the ultimately defeated Catholic Relief Bill of 1813. By 1824 he was denouncing Catholic emancipation in public. Having taken the coronation oath on his accession, George now argued that he had sworn to uphold the Protestant faith, and could not support any pro-Catholic measures. The influence of the Crown was so great, and the will of the Tories under Prime Minister Liverpool so strong, that Catholic emancipation seemed hopeless. In 1827, however, Liverpool retired, to be replaced by the pro-emancipation Tory George Canning. When Canning entered office, the King, hitherto content with privately instructing his ministers on the Catholic Question, thought it fit to make a public declaration to the effect that his sentiments on the question were those of his revered father, George III.
data.translation: 乔治在后期大多数时间在温斯特城堡孤独生活，但他继续介入政治。初期认为他会支持 католи教徒解放，因为他在1797年提出了一项关于爱尔兰的 католи教徒解放法案，但他的反 като教徒观点在1813年成为明显的，当他私下反对了1813年被驳回的1813年的 католи教徒救济法案。直到1824年，他公开否定了 католи教徒解放。在他上位时就作了誓言，他现在认为他已经誓言要维护基督教，因此无法支持任何关于 католи教徒的措施。皇室的影响很大，伟大的托利党政府领导人利维斯特的意志很强，使得 католи教徒解放似乎无希。但是，在1827年，利维斯特辞职，被替代为支持解放的托利党的乔治·坎宁。当坎宁上任时，王子，以前只是私下地指导自己的ministers 关于 като利问题，认为该公布一份声明，其意思是他的立场与他尊敬的父亲乔治III一样。

data.translation: 乔治一世的后期继位时间里，他很少出现在公众面前，但他仍然参与政治事务，首先是因为他在1797年提出了为爱尔兰提出的天主教解放法案，之后他的反天主教立场逐渐明朗化，1813年他在私下中反对了最终失败的天主教解放法案，1824年他在公众面前表示自己曾在继位时宣誓保卫圣公会信仰，因此不能支持天主教的任何倡议，因为英国君主制的权威巨大，以及利物浦首相兼执政党领袖所领导的保守党的强大力量，都让天主教解放几乎变得不可能，直到1827年利物浦首相兼执政党领袖鲍勃·卡尼恩（Bob Canning）退休，由卡尼恩的替代者爱德华·肖（Edward Shaw）接替，乔治三世在继位时就表示，他的宗教信仰与圣徒乔治三世的宗教信仰一致，因此他不能支持任何天主教倡议。

以供未來回答那些希望讓自家貓咪成為純素食者的Quorans參考

data.text: Because The Smithsonian Answer Book: Cats goes into more detail on cats' nutritional needs than I have ever seen elsewhere, I decided to copy out the most relevant section for future use in replying to Quorans who want their cats to be vegan. Just maybe, at least some of those persons will be influenced by this material, and abandon the futile attempt to turn their cats into something that is biologically impossible. Below is a sample of statements made in the book. I've highlighted the most crucial points. (Note that the Smithsonian does not use the common term, "obligate carnivores" to describe cats. They use the alternate terms, "strict carnivores" and "hypercarnivores", with the identical meaning.)
data.translation: 因為《史密森尼問答書：貓》對貓咪的營養需求進行了比我以往在其他地方看到的更為詳盡的探討，所以我決定摘抄出最相關的部分，以供未來回答那些希望讓自家貓咪成為純素食者的Quorans參考。或許，至少部分讀者會被這些資訊所感染，並丟棄那種將貓咪轉變為在生理上不可能實現的目標的徒勞嘗試。以下為書中的部分陳述範例，我也突出了其中最為關鍵的要點。（請注意，《史密森尼》並未採用通用術語“唯一肉食動物”來形容貓咪，而是使用了“嚴格肉食者”和“高度肉食者”這兩個替代術語，意思相同。）

data.text: Q-learning excels in learning from feedback within sequential decision-making tasks but requires extensive sampling for significant improvements. Although reward shaping is a powerful technique for enhancing learning efficiency, it can introduce biases that affect agent performance. Furthermore, potential-based reward shaping is constrained as it does not allow for reward modifications based on actions or terminal states, potentially limiting its effectiveness in complex environments. Additionally, large language models (LLMs) can achieve zero-shot learning, but this is generally limited to simpler tasks. They also exhibit low inference speeds and occasionally produce hallucinations. To address these issues, we propose LLM-guided Q-learning that employs LLMs as heuristic to aid in learning the Q-function for reinforcement learning. It combines the advantages of both technologies without introducing performance bias. Our theoretical analysis demonstrates that the LLM heuristic provides action-level guidance. Additionally, our architecture has the capability to convert the impact of hallucinations into exploration costs. Moreover, the converged Q function corresponds to the MDP optimal Q function. Experiment results demonstrated that our algorithm enables agents to avoid ineffective exploration, enhances sampling efficiency, and is well-suited for complex control tasks.
data.translation: Q学习擅长通过顺序决策任务中的反馈学习，但需要大量抽样才能实现显著改进。尽管奖励塑造是一种增强学习效率的强大技术，但它可能引入偏见影响智能体的表现。此外，基于潜力的奖励塑造受限于它不能基于行动或终止状态修改奖励，这可能限制其在复杂环境中的有效性。此外，大型语言模型（LLM）能够实现零次学习，但这通常仅限于简单任务。它们还表现出低推理速度，并偶尔会产生幻觉。为了解决这些问题，我们提出了LLM引导的Q学习，该方法利用LLM作为启发式工具帮助学习用于强化学习的Q函数。它结合了两种技术的优势，而不引入性能偏见。我们的理论分析表明，LLM启发式提供了行动级指导。此外，我们的架构具有将幻觉影响转化为探索成本的能力。而且，收敛的Q函数与MDP最优Q函数一致。实验结果显示，我们的算法使智能体能够避免无效探索，提高抽样效率，并且非常适合复杂的控制任务。

data.translation: Q-learning在序列决策任务中学习反馈有明显优势，但需要大量采样才能获得显著的改善。尽管奖励形状是加速学习效率的强大技术，但它可以引入影响代理性能的偏差。此外，潜在基础奖励形状受到限制，因为它不允许根据动作或终止状态进行奖励修改，可能限制其在复杂环境中的有效性。此外，大语言模型（LLM）可以实现零惊讶学习，但这通常限于简单任务。它们也表现出低速度推理并偶尔产生幻觉。为了解决这些问题，我们提出了基于LLM指导的Q-学习，该方法将LLM用作辅助工具，以帮助学习强化学习中的Q函数。它结合了两种技术的优点，而不会引入性能偏差。我们的理论分析表明，LLM指导提供了行动级指导。此外，我们的架构具有将幻觉影响转化为探索成本的能力。此外，趋于收敛的Q函数相当于MDP最优Q函数。实验结果表明，我们的算法使代理能够避免无效的探索，提高采样效率，并适合于复杂的控制任务。

value.text: 收敛的Q函数对应于MDP的最优Q函数

data.text: Q-learning excels in learning from feedback within sequential decision-making tasks but requires extensive sampling for significant improvements. Although reward shaping is a powerful technique for enhancing learning efficiency, it can introduce biases that affect agent performance. Furthermore, potential-based reward shaping is constrained as it does not allow for reward modifications based on actions or terminal states, potentially limiting its effectiveness in complex environments. Additionally, large language models (LLMs) can achieve zero-shot learning, but this is generally limited to simpler tasks. They also exhibit low inference speeds and occasionally produce hallucinations. To address these issues, we propose LLM-guided Q-learning that employs LLMs as heuristic to aid in learning the Q-function for reinforcement learning. It combines the advantages of both technologies without introducing performance bias. Our theoretical analysis demonstrates that the LLM heuristic provides action-level guidance. Additionally, our architecture has the capability to convert the impact of hallucinations into exploration costs. Moreover, the converged Q function corresponds to the MDP optimal Q function. Experiment results demonstrated that our algorithm enables agents to avoid ineffective exploration, enhances sampling efficiency, and is well-suited for complex control tasks.
data.translation: Q学习擅长在顺序决策任务中从反馈中学习，但需要大量样本才能显著改进。尽管奖励塑形是一种强大的技术，用以提高学习效率，但它可能引入偏见，影响代理的性能。此外，基于潜力的奖励塑形受到限制，因为它不允许基于行动或终态来修改奖励，这可能在复杂环境中限制其有效性。另外，大型语言模型（LLM）可以实现零样本学习，但这通常限于简单任务。它们还表现出低推理速度并偶尔产生幻觉。为了解决这些问题，我们提出了LLM引导的Q学习，它利用LLM作为启发式工具帮助学习强化学习的Q函数。这种方法结合了两种技术的优势，而不引入性能偏差。我们的理论分析表明，LLM启发式提供了行动级指导。此外，我们的架构能够将幻觉的影响转化为探索成本。而且，收敛的Q函数对应于MDP的最优Q函数。实验结果表明，我们的算法使代理能够避免无效的探索，提高样本效率，并且非常适合复杂的控制任务。

data.text: Another sight malady is related to a deficiency in vitamin A. Most mammals also produce vitamin A themselves, which is needed in turning beta-carotene into retinol, a step in the production of light-absorbing pigments in the retina. They eat plant foods to acquire the necessary beta-carotene directly from plant sources; without a dietary source of both vitamin A and beta-carotene, cats suffer night blindness. Wild cats obtain both from animal fat and organ meat. However, a diet concentrated in vitamin A can be toxic. This vitamin is fat-soluble (meaning it is stored in the fat and used only as needed), so it can build up to dangerous levels in the body, which could happen in your cat if you were to feed it nothing but liver.
data.translation: 另一种视力疾病的原因是维生素A缺乏。大多数哺乳动物也能自行生成维生素A。维生素A是在转化胡萝卜素成醌甙酸的过程中必不可少的，这是光感受色素形成的过程。动物食物中的胡萝卜素可以直接转化为维生素A，但如果没有来源于植物的维生素A和胡萝卜素，猫就会出现夜盲症。野生猫可以从动物脂肪和肝脏中获得维生素A和胡萝卜素，但是这种饮食方式可能会导致血液中的维生素A浓度过高，这种情况可能会发生在你的猫身上，如果你只喂它吃肝脏，那么它可能会出现眼睛发红、流泪、甚至失明的症状。维生素A是一种脂溶性维生素，它会在体内堆积，这样会导致不良反应。

data.text: As AI increasingly integrates with human decision-making, we must carefully consider interactions between the two. In particular, current approaches focus on optimizing individual agent actions but often overlook the nuances of collective intelligence. Group dynamics might require that one agent (e.g., the AI system) compensate for biases and errors in another agent (e.g., the human), but this compensation should be carefully developed. We provide a theoretical framework for algorithmic compensation that synthesizes game theory and reinforcement learning principles to demonstrate the natural emergence of deceptive outcomes from the continuous learning dynamics of agents. We provide simulation results involving Markov Decision Processes (MDP) learning to interact. This work then underpins our ethical analysis of the conditions in which AI agents should adapt to biases and behaviors of other agents in dynamic and complex decision-making environments. Overall, our approach addresses the nuanced role of strategic deception of humans, challenging previous assumptions about its detrimental effects. We assert that compensation for others' biases can enhance coordination and ethical alignment: strategic deception, when ethically managed, can positively shape human-AI interactions.
data.translation: 随着人工智能与人类决策的融合日益深入，我们需要认真考虑人工智能和人类决策之间的相互作用。特别需要注意的是，当前的方法主要关注于优化个体行为，却往往忽略了团队智能的复杂性。团队中的每个成员都会有自己的优点和缺点，而在决策过程中，这些优点和缺点可能会对彼此产生差异化的影响。团队中的一个成员（例如，人工智能系统）可能需要补偿另一个成员（如人类）的偏见和错误，但这种补偿应该如何开展，还需要仔细研究。我们提出了一个理论框架，将游戏理论和强化学习原理相结合，以证明在决策过程中不断学习的动态情况下，团队智能的自然产生。我们还提供了一些模拟结果，以揭示在决策过程中，利用马尔可夫决策过程学习（MDP）的学习算法进行交互的情况。这些工作为我们的道德分析提供了理论基础，我们认为，当人工智能需要补偿其他人的偏见和行为时，这种补偿应当是有意识的，并且应当充分考虑人与人工智能之间的关系。我们认为，人工智能的补偿可以促进团队的协同和道德契合，即人工智能可以通过隐瞒自己的偏见和错误来补偿其他人的偏见和错误。

value.text: 这项工作支撑了我们对AI代理应在动态复杂的决策环境中适应其他代理的偏见和行为的条件的伦理分析。

We provide a theoretical framework for algorithmic compensation that synthesizes game theory and reinforcement learning principles to demonstrate the natural emergence of deceptive outcomes from the continuous learning dynamics of agents. We provide simulation results involving Markov Decision Processes (MDP) learning to interact. data.text: In the United States, since 1974, lead is prohibited in solder and flux in plumbing applications for drinking water use, per the Safe Drinking Water Act. Historically, a higher proportion of lead was used, commonly 50/50. This had the advantage of making the alloy solidify more slowly. With the pipes being physically fitted together before soldering, the solder could be wiped over the joint to ensure water tightness. Although lead water pipes were displaced by copper when the significance of lead poisoning began to be fully appreciated, lead solder was still used until the 1980s because it was thought that the amount of lead that could leach into water from the solder was negligible from a properly soldered joint. The electrochemical couple of copper and lead promotes corrosion of the lead and tin. Tin, however, is protected by insoluble oxide. Since even small amounts of lead have been found detrimental to health as a potent neurotoxin, lead in plumbing solder was replaced by silver (food-grade applications) or antimony, with copper often added, and the proportion of tin was increased (see lead-free solder).
data.translation: 在美国，从1974年开始，铅被禁用在焊接剂和焊料中用于供水管道应用，这是根据《安全饮用水法》规定的。在历史上，铅的比例通常为50％，这有利于铅合金在固化过程中凝固得更慢。由于管道需要经过实际对接才能焊接，因此可以用焊条来擦拭焊缝以确保管道的密封性。铅水管在人们认识到铅中毒危害的重要性后，被铜管替代，但是由于铜与铅的电化学反应会促进铅的腐蚀，而铜的绝缘层不溶于水，因此铅仍被用于焊接剂中，且锡的用量也随之增加，并且铜的比例也增加，从而降低了铅对人体的危害，目前使用的是铅含量较低的铜锡合金（食品级）。铅在锡合金中的含量很低，因此对人体的危害也相对较小。

Historically, a higher proportion of lead was used, commonly 50/50. This had the advantage of making the alloy solidify more slowly. With the pipes being physically fitted together before soldering, the solder could be wiped over the joint to ensure water tightness. Although lead water pipes were displaced by copper when the significance of lead poisoning began to be fully appreciated, lead solder was still used until the 1980s because it was thought that the amount of lead that could leach into water from the solder was negligible from a properly soldered joint. The electrochemical couple of copper and lead promotes corrosion of the lead and tin. Tin, however, is protected by insoluble oxide. Since even small amounts of lead have been found detrimental to health as a potent neurotoxin, lead in plumbing solder was replaced by silver (food-grade applications) or antimony, with copper often added, and the proportion of tin was increased (see lead-free solder).
data.translation: 在美国，自1974年起，《安全饮用水法》规定禁止在用于饮用水的管道焊接中使用含铅的焊料和助焊剂。历史上，焊料中铅的比例较高，通常为50/50。这样做的好处是使合金凝固得更慢。由于管道在焊接前需要物理安装，焊工可以在接头处擦拭焊料以确保其水密性。虽然当铅中毒的严重性开始被全面认识到时，铅水管已被铜管取代，但由于人们认为从焊接良好的接头中渗出的铅量可以忽略不计，铅焊料一直使用到1980年代。铜与铅的电化学偶对促使铅和锡的腐蚀。然而，锡被不溶性氧化物保护。由于即使是少量的铅也被发现对健康有害，且为强烈的神经毒素，因此管道焊料中的铅被银（食品级应用）或锑取代，通常还会添加铜，且增加了锡的比例（见无铅焊料）。

data.text: In the United States, since 1974, lead is prohibited in solder and flux in plumbing applications for drinking water use, per the Safe Drinking Water Act. Historically, a higher proportion of lead was used, commonly 50/50. This had the advantage of making the alloy solidify more slowly. With the pipes being physically fitted together before soldering, the solder could be wiped over the joint to ensure water tightness. Although lead water pipes were displaced by copper when the significance of lead poisoning began to be fully appreciated, lead solder was still used until the 1980s because it was thought that the amount of lead that could leach into water from the solder was negligible from a properly soldered joint. The electrochemical couple of copper and lead promotes corrosion of the lead and tin. Tin, however, is protected by insoluble oxide. Since even small amounts of lead have been found detrimental to health as a potent neurotoxin, lead in plumbing solder was replaced by silver (food-grade applications) or antimony, with copper often added, and the proportion of tin was increased (see lead-free solder).
data.translation: 在美国，自 1974 年起，根据饮用水安全法，对于供饮用水用的管道铺设，焊料和熔剂中的铅均被禁止使用。历史上，铅的使用比例通常为 50%，而铅在这些应用中的使用比例通常为 50%。这有利于铅合金在焊接时凝固的速度较慢。为了确保水密性，焊接前铜管会进行物理连接，然后涂抹焊料，以确保焊接点的水密性。当铅中毒的危害性才被充分认识时，铜管就开始取代铅管，但是铅焊料一直到 1980 年代仍然使用，因为认为焊接后铅焊条中铅的渗出量微乎其微，因此不会对水质造成任何影响。然而，由于铜和铅的电化学特性使铅易于腐蚀，因此铅焊条被替代为银（食品级用途）或锡，并且铜通常被添加到焊条中，而锡的比例也增加了（详见铅含量为零的焊条）。

value.text: 焊料和管道用助焊剂中禁止使用铅，主要用于饮用水。
尽管铅水管在铅中毒的重要性开始被充分认识后被铜取代

data.text: In the United States, since 1974, lead is prohibited in solder and flux in plumbing applications for drinking water use, per the Safe Drinking Water Act. Historically, a higher proportion of lead was used, commonly 50/50. This had the advantage of making the alloy solidify more slowly. With the pipes being physically fitted together before soldering, the solder could be wiped over the joint to ensure water tightness. Although lead water pipes were displaced by copper when the significance of lead poisoning began to be fully appreciated, lead solder was still used until the 1980s because it was thought that the amount of lead that could leach into water from the solder was negligible from a properly soldered joint. The electrochemical couple of copper and lead promotes corrosion of the lead and tin. Tin, however, is protected by insoluble oxide. Since even small amounts of lead have been found detrimental to health as a potent neurotoxin, lead in plumbing solder was replaced by silver (food-grade applications) or antimony, with copper often added, and the proportion of tin was increased (see lead-free solder).
data.translation: 自1974年以来，在美国，根据《安全饮用水法案》，焊料和管道用助焊剂中禁止使用铅，主要用于饮用水。历史上常用更高比例的铅，通常是50/50。这样做的好处是使合金凝固得更慢。在焊接前将管道物理上连接在一起，然后擦拭焊料以确保密封性。尽管铅水管在铅中毒的重要性开始被充分认识后被铜取代，但直到1980年代还在使用铅焊料，因为人们认为从正确焊接的接头中铅溶解至水中的量微乎其微。铜和铅的电化学偶促进铅和锡的腐蚀。但锡得到不溶的氧化物保护。由于即使少量铅已被发现对健康有害，作为一种有效的神经毒素，管道用铅焊料被替换为银（食品级应用）或锑，通常还会加入铜，而锡的比例也增加了（见无铅焊料）。

Since even small amounts of lead have been found detrimental to health as a potent neurotoxin, lead in plumbing solder was replaced by silver (food-grade applications) or antimony, with copper often added, and the proportion of tin was increased (see lead-free solder).
data.translation: 自1974年以来，根据《安全饮用水法》，在美国的饮用水管道中，焊料和助焊剂中不允许使用铅。历史上，人们通常使用更高比例的铅，常见比例为50/50。这种方式的优点是使合金凝固速度更慢。在焊接之前，管道被物理地组合在一起，焊料可以被擦拭到接头上，以确保密封性。尽管铅水管在铅中毒的重要性得到充分认识后被铜代替，但铅焊料一直使用到1980年代，因为人们认为从正确焊接的接头中可以溶出的铅量是微不足道的。铜与铅的电化学偶促进了铅和锡的腐蚀。然而，锡被不溶的氧化物保护着。由于即使少量的铅对健康有害，作为强效神经毒素，因此铅在管道焊料中被取代为银（适用于食品级场合）或锑，通常添加铜，并增加了锡的比例（参见无铅焊料）。

data.translation: 美国自1974年以来，根据安全饮用水法，在饮用水管道应用中禁止使用铅在焊接锡和胶水中。历史上，铅的使用比例更高，通常为50/50。这有利于使所oy所制成的合金慢慢凝固。由于管道在焊接之前已经被物理地组装在一起，所以可以在接口上擦拭锡以确保水密。尽管铅水管被铜所取代，因为铅毒害的重要性开始被充分理解，但直到1980年代，因为认为从正常焊接的接口上可以泄漏的铅量很小，铅锡仍然被使用。铜和铅的电化学对偶促进了铅和锡的腐蚀。然而，锡受到不可解散的氧化物保护。由于小量的铅对健康有害，作为毒素，铅在焊接锡中被取代为食用级铜或锇，铜通常也被添加，锡的比例也被增加（请参见无铅锡）。

data.translation: 在美国，根据《安全饮用水法》（Safe Drinking Water Act），自1974年起，禁止在饮用水管道应用中使用含铅的焊料和助焊剂。历史上，含铅比例较高，通常为50/50。这有一个优点，即使合金凝固得更慢。在焊接前，管道需进行物理拼接，焊料可以在接头处涂抹以确保水密性。尽管当铅中毒的危害开始被充分认识后，铅水管被铜管取代，但由于人们认为从焊好的接头中渗出的铅量可以忽略不计，含铅焊料一直使用到1980年代。铜和铅的电化学偶促进了铅和锡的腐蚀。然而，锡被不溶性氧化物保护。鉴于即使是少量的铅也被发现对健康有害，因其是一种强效神经毒素，管道焊料中的铅被银（食品级应用）或锑所取代，常添加铜，且锡的比例增加（见无铅焊料）。

Historically, a higher proportion of lead was used, commonly 50/50. This had the advantage of making the alloy solidify more slowly. With the pipes being physically fitted together before soldering, the solder could be wiped over the joint to ensure water tightness. Although lead water pipes were displaced by copper when the significance of lead poisoning began to be fully appreciated, lead solder was still used until the 1980s because it was thought that the amount of lead that could leach into water from the solder was negligible from a properly soldered joint. The electrochemical couple of copper and lead promotes corrosion of the lead and tin. Tin, however, is protected by insoluble oxide. Since even small amounts of lead have been found detrimental to health as a potent neurotoxin, lead in plumbing solder was replaced by silver (food-grade applications) or antimony, with copper often added, and the proportion of tin was increased (see lead-free solder).
data.translation: 在美国，根据《安全饮用水法》，自1974年起禁止在供饮用水的管道焊接中使用含铅的焊料和助焊剂。历史上，焊料通常含铅高达50%。这样的合金凝固较慢是一个优点。因为在焊接之前，管道需要先进行物理连接，然后再在接口处涂抹焊料以确保密封无泄漏。虽然随着人们对铅中毒危害的逐渐认识，铅水管被铜管替代，但由于认为焊接处的铅释放量可以忽略不计，含铅焊料一直使用到1980年代。铜和铅形成的电化学对会加速铅和锡的腐蚀；然而，锡通过不溶性氧化物得到保护。考虑到即使是微量的铅也被证实对健康极为有害，作为强效神经毒素，管道焊料中的铅被银（用于食品级应用）或锑替代，通常还会添加铜，同时增加锡的比例（参见无铅焊料）。

data.translation: 自1974年起，根据《安全饮用水法案》，美国禁止在管道饮用水应用中的焊料和助焊剂中使用铅。在历史上，铅的比例较高，通常为50/50。这样做的好处是使合金凝固得更缓慢。在焊接之前，管道被物理地连接在一起，焊料可以擦拭至接头以确保密封性。尽管随着铅中毒问题被充分认识，铅水管被铜所取代，但直到1980年代，人们仍然使用铅焊料，因为他们认为从正确焊接的接头中溶出的铅量微乎其微。铜和铅的电化学偶会促进铅和锡的腐蚀。然而，锡会被不溶的氧化物所保护。由于即使极少量的铅也被发现对健康有害，作为强效神经毒素，管道焊料中的铅已被替换为银（用于食品级应用）或锑，通常还加入铜，并增加锡的含量（详见无铅焊料）。

data.text: Boeing’s Starliner spacecraft is preparing for a historic astronaut launch after years of delays and setbacks. The long-awaited mission is on track to carry two NASA astronauts — Suni Williams and Butch Wilmore — to the International Space Station. If successful, the Starliner will join SpaceX’s Crew Dragon spacecraft in making routine trips to the space station, keeping the orbiting outpost fully staffed with astronauts from NASA and its partner space agencies. The mission is scheduled to take off from Florida as soon as May 6, but a NASA administrator emphasized the launch will take place “when we’re ready.” Notably, Boeing’s space division operates separately from its embattled commercial airline team, and officials at NASA and the US aerospace giant have routinely sought to make that distinction.
data.translation: 波音公司的星舰飞船在经历多年的延迟和挫折后，正在准备进行一次具有历史意义的宇航员发射。这个备受期待的任务计划将两名NASA宇航员——苏尼·威廉姆斯和布奇·威尔莫尔——送往国际空间站。如果成功，星舰飞船将与SpaceX的龙飞船一起定期前往空间站，确保空间站有来自NASA及其合作夥伴航天机构的宇航员驻扎。这次任务计划于5月6日或之后从佛罗里达发射，但NASA管理者强调发射将在“我们准备好时”进行。值得注意的是，波音的空间部门与备受争议的商用航空团队是分开运作的，NASA和这家美国航空航天巨头的官员们一直在强调这一区别。

data.text: Boeing’s Starliner spacecraft is preparing for a historic astronaut launch after years of delays and setbacks. The long-awaited mission is on track to carry two NASA astronauts — Suni Williams and Butch Wilmore — to the International Space Station. If successful, the Starliner will join SpaceX’s Crew Dragon spacecraft in making routine trips to the space station, keeping the orbiting outpost fully staffed with astronauts from NASA and its partner space agencies. The mission is scheduled to take off from Florida as soon as May 6, but a NASA administrator emphasized the launch will take place “when we’re ready.” Notably, Boeing’s space division operates separately from its embattled commercial airline team, and officials at NASA and the US aerospace giant have routinely sought to make that distinction.

data.text: In the rapidly evolving landscape of Natural Language Processing (NLP), Large Language Models (LLMs) have emerged as powerful tools for many tasks, such as extracting valuable insights from vast amounts of textual data. In this study, we conduct a comparative analysis of LLMs for the extraction of travel customer needs from TripAdvisor posts. Leveraging a diverse range of models, including both open-source and proprietary ones such as GPT-4 and Gemini, we aim to elucidate their strengths and weaknesses in this specialized domain. Through an evaluation process involving metrics such as BERTScore, ROUGE, and BLEU, we assess the performance of each model in accurately identifying and summarizing customer needs. Our findings highlight the efficacy of opensource LLMs, particularly Mistral 7B, in achieving comparable performance to larger closed models while offering affordability and customization benefits. Additionally, we underscore the importance of considering factors such as model size, resource requirements, and performance metrics when selecting the most suitable LLM for customer needs analysis tasks. Overall, this study contributes valuable insights for businesses seeking to leverage advanced NLP techniques to enhance customer experience and drive operational efficiency in the travel industry.
data.translation: 在自然语言处理（NLP）领域快速发展的背景下，大型语言模型（LLMs）已成为许多任务的强大工具，例如从海量文本数据中提取有价值见解。本研究旨在比较分析LLMs在提取TripAdvisor帖子中的旅行客户需求方面的表现。我们运用各种模型，包括开源和专有模型，如GPT-4和Gemini，旨在揭示它们在这一专业领域中的优势与劣势。通过评估过程，包括BERTScore、ROUGE和BLEU等指标，我们评估每个模型在准确识别和概括客户需求方面的性能。研究结果凸显了开源LLMs的有效性，特别是Mistral 7B，在价格实惠和定制化优势的基础上实现了与更大闭源模型相当的表现。此外，我们强调在选择最适合的LLM用于客户需求分析任务时，考虑模型大小、资源要求和性能指标等因素的重要性。总的来说，本研究为寻求利用先进的NLP技术来提升客户体验和提高旅行业运营效率的企业提供了宝贵见解。

data.translation: 在自然语言处理领域（Natural Language Processing，简称NLP）中，大规模语言模型（Large Language Models，简称LLMs）正在为许多任务中提供强大的支持，例如从大量的文本数据中提取出有价值的洞察。本研究中，我们对旅游领域TripAdvisor平台上的旅游客户需求提取任务中LLMs的比较分析表明，利用包括开源和商业版的多种模型，例如GPT-4和Gemini，我们能够评估这些模型在正确识别和总结旅游客户需求方面的表现。为此，我们采用了BERTScore、ROUGE、BLEU等多种评估指标，评估模型的精准度。我们的结果表明，开源的LLMs，尤其是Mistral 7B，在与大型商业模型相比，在满足相同需求时表现较佳，而且具有成本和定制化优势。此外，我们还指出了选择LLM时需要考虑的因素，例如模型大小、资源需求和精度等。总体而言，这项研究对于那些希望通过NLP技术来提升客户体验和提高运营效率的旅游业公司来说，具有重要意义。

data.translation: 在自然语言处理（NLP）领域飞速发展之际，大型语言模型（LLMs）已成为多项任务的强大工具，特别是用于从海量文本数据中提取有价值的洞见。本研究通过对TripAdvisor帖子中旅行客户需求的提取进行比较分析，探讨了不同模型的特点。我们利用了多种模型，包括开源和专有模型如GPT-4和Gemini，以揭示它们在该专业领域的优势与不足。通过采用BERTScore、ROUGE和BLEU等评价指标，我们评估了各模型在准确识别和概括客户需求方面的表现。研究结果突显了开源LLMs，尤其是Mistral 7B在性能上能够与大型封闭模型相媲美，同时还提供了成本效益和可定制性的优势。此外，我们还强调在选择适合客户需求分析任务的LLM时，必须考虑模型的大小、资源需求和性能指标。总体来看，本研究为企业利用先进的NLP技术优化客户体验和提升旅游行业运营效率提供了宝贵的洞见。

data.text: UV excimer lasers have been demonstrated to about 126 nm (for Ar2*). Mercury arc lamps are designed to maintain a steady DC current of 50 to 150 Volts, however excimer lasers have a higher resolution. Excimer lasers are gas-based light systems that are usually filled with inert and halide gases (Kr, Ar, Xe, F and Cl) that are charged by an electric field. The higher the frequency, the greater the resolution of the image. KrF lasers are able to function at a frequency of 4 kHz . In addition to running at a higher frequency, excimer lasers are compatible with more advanced machines than mercury arc lamps are. They are also able to operate from greater distances (up to 25 meters) and are able to maintain their accuracy with a series of mirrors and antireflective-coated lenses. By setting up multiple lasers and mirrors, the amount of energy loss is minimized, also since the lenses are coated with antireflective material, the light intensity remains relatively the same from when it left the laser to when it hits the wafer.
data.translation: 紫外激光器已展示到约126纳米（对于Ar2*）。汞弧灯设计为维持50至150伏的稳定直流电流，然而激光器具有更高的分辨率。激光器是基于气体的光系统，通常充填惰性及卤化气（Kr, Ar, Xe, F和Cl），通过电场充电。频率越高，图像分辨率越大。KrF激光器能在4kHz的频率下工作。除了高频运行，激光器与更先进的机器兼容性更好，超过了汞弧灯。它们还能从更大的距离（最高25米）操作，并能通过一系列镜子和抗反射涂层镜头保持精确度。通过设置多个激光器和镜子，能量损失被最小化，同时由于镜头涂有抗反射材料，从激光器发出到击中晶圆的光强度相对保持不变。

data.text: And to be clear, Melania is not abandoning Donald. She’s just not showing up for lengthy court hearings. She is on the campaign trail for him, albeit in a fairly limited capacity, and has long allowed him to dominate the limelight. He is running for president again, so she’s ostensibly on board with his political aspirations – including his authoritarian plans for the nation. She is a bit of a cipher – it’s never been clear whether she has much in the way of political opinions at all – but she is willing to stay married to her husband despite his abhorrent character.
data.translation: 要澄清一点，梅拉尼娅并未抛弃唐纳德。她只是不参加那些漫长的法庭听证。尽管参与程度有限，她仍在为他的竞选活动助力，也长期让他居于聚光灯之下。他正在再次竞选总统，因此她表面上支持他的政治雄心——包括他对国家的专制计划。梅拉尼娅一直颇为神秘，她是否持有明确的政治立场一直不得而知——但尽管对他的品行深感厌恶，她还是选择与他维持婚姻关系。
